name: valueset-weight-status
title: Weight Status
description:
Weight status is auto-calculated based on the young infant's weight for age Z-score, which is determined from a standardized chart for weight -for-age for the infant's sex. 
A young infant is low weight for age if the z-score is below -2. 
A young infant who is less than 7 days old and weighs less than 2 kg is considered very low weight.
Some young infants who are low weight for age were born with low birth weight. Some did not gain weight well after birth.
